entry.title: Python LightningNetwork implementation
entry.summary: In an email chain dated August 12, 2015, Jasper Hugunin shared a repository link for Lightning routing with Bryan. Bryan then raised concerns about the routing method, specifically questioning what would happen if the peer did not know the destination or if there were multiple peers involved. Additionally, Bryan provided his contact information and website URL. The email also included an HTML attachment that was scrubbed of its URL.
